name: practitioner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 someone involved in a skilled job or activity: Elizabeth Quan is a London-based practitioner of traditional Chinese medicine. She was a medical practitioner (= a doctor) before she entered politics. See also
GP

Add to word list
someone whose regular work has involved a lot of training: Dr. Goldstein is a family/general practitioner (= a medical doctor who treats general conditions).
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who works in a job that involves long training and high levels of skill: He has years of experience as a senior practitioner in the financial services industry. a health/legal/medical practitioner See also
insolvency practitioner
